description.narrative: Medium level appeal to provide assistance to those affected by Typhoon Haiyan (Yolanda) in the Philippines.

participating-org.narrative: UK Department for International Development (DFID) USD

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom
